shortcv.p: Dimitrios Mitropoulos is a PhD Candidate at the Athens University of Economics and Business (AUEB), Department of Management Science and Technology. He holds a BSc in Informatics and Telecommunications from National and Kapodistrian University of Athens and a MSc in Information Systems from Athens University of Economics and Business.

In the past he has worked in IT support and software development positions during his studies. He is a member of the SENSE group. His research interests include Countering Code Injection Attacks, Software Security, Static code analysis, Types and Programming Languages and Software Engineering.
